name: Garber Maria
description:
Our house lies very centrally in Ramsau, to the next skiing area (Ramsberglift), to the ski bus stop and to the train you only need 5 WALKING MINUTES. 
To the bigger skiing areas like Zillertal arena and Mayrhofner mountain railways / Horbergbahn you need 5 AUTOMINUTES. 
The flat with balcony is furnished comfortably, 
with 2 separate bedrooms for 4-6 people.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower and bath, toilet
makesOffer.description: Completely comfortably furnished non-smokers-Ferienwohng for 4-6 people, 2 separate bedrooms, bath / WC, kitchen, double sleep couch, Sat TV, balcony. . .
